name: The Shop of Butterfly
description:
The main idea of the “Shop of ButterFly” game is that one shop owner can grant all wishes to his customer. But for every wish, there is a cost equally its wish. It’s inspired by “XXXHolic” and “Jigoku Shoujo" anime. The game is more like an interactive movie & game.

On demo it has just one short quest to show you the main idea.
